mapper.select: SELECT m.m_nickname FROM aboard ab JOIN member m ON ab.m_idx = m.m_idx WHERE ab.ab_idx = #{ab_idx}
SELECT m.m_photo FROM aboard ab JOIN member m ON ab.m_idx = m.m_idx WHERE ab.ab_idx = #{ab_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into aboard(m_idx, qb_idx, ab_content, ab_photo, ab_writeday) VALUES (#{m_idx},#{qb_idx},#{ab_content},#{ab_photo},now())
mapper.update: update aboard set ab_content=#{ab_content} ,ab_photo=#{ab_photo} where ab_idx=#{ab_idx}
